item.description:
MAY COMEDY NIGHT with two different headliners; Ira Proctor & Steve Scarfo!

Ira Proctor is a Boston based comedian that has traveled

everyplace from Las Vegas to Afghanistan performing comedy. He recently showcased to rave revues at the prestigious Montreal Comedy Festival, was featured on the Today Show, and finished his second season of NESN's Comedy All-Stars. He's the Boston winner of Sierra Mist's "Next Great Comic Search," become a fixture in the Boston Comedy Festival, and has appeared in Comedy Central's "Laugh Riots." Ira’s other credits include appearances on ABC’s Inside Edition, Fox News, New England Cable News, NBC Nightly News, Chronicle and XM radio along with commercials for Diet Pepsi, Harvey Windows and Bob’s Stores.

 

STEVE SCARFO began the stand-up life back in 1996 and was noticed by The Boston Globe at his first performance. His high energy, real life approach to material coupled with his sometimes bizarre viewpoint is sure to strike a chord in any audience and keep them in stitches. He has worked all over New England, including Comedy Connection in Portland, and Nicks Comedy Stop in Boston. Steve has opened for many quality acts – including: Dave Coulier, Victoria Jackson, Jeff Dunham, Lenny Clarke and Bob Marley. Steve also appeared in the A&E real life drama ‘Caesars 24 / 7’, figured prominently in the Red Sox World Series MasterCard commercial, and appears in several movies (most notably "Fever Pitch" and "The Pink Panther 2").

 

--- Price is still only $15. Pay at the door.

--- Plenty of parking available just across the street!

--- Cash bar always available!!

---Don't forget to fill out an entry form when you arrive for surprise gifts!!! Drawings held the night if the show.

My Contact # is (603) 759-9876

 

THERE'S SOMETHING NEW JUST FOR US!

Gary & Cindy, owners of the pearl, have invited our meetup family to a light dinner before the show! A variety of sandwiches, wraps, beverages (alcoholic & non), soups, and sides will be available for purchase starting at 6:00 pm.

This is exclusive to the Portsmouth & Beyond meetup group members as a convenient alternative to planning a more expensive restaurant dinner before the show.

So, come join us at 6:00 pm, to socialize and enjoy freshly made soups  & sandwiches at the Pearl! ....... no parking hassles, headaches, or planning efforts! Cindy & Gary, our dear sponsors, will do it all! CLICK HERE to RSVP.



 

This posting, and the information contained within, is not to be copied, modified, edited, or re-posted in any way without the expressed written consent of the "Portsmouth and Beyond" meetup.com Organizer. Thank you for your cooperation!
item.how_to_find_us: Just come upstairs and you'll see tables to the right with meetup signs. Get there early! My cell; (603)759-9876

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: COMEDY NIGHT At the PORTSMOUTH PEARL
